entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 38.
